text: @NYGovCuomo Yes it can! Which you have proved Gov. Cuomo...with smarts, vision, focus, teamwork, and compassion for your fellow man.  It is you who blazed this covid-19 trail to contain the beast.....and although no one says it...I SEE IT!!! HANG IN THERE, TAKE CARE OF YOURSELF..heart you.
